name: French in a Flash: Boursin and Tomato Mini Tartines
description: These tartines are assembled on long slices of crisply toasted baguette topped with a mash of garlic and herb Boursin, cut with ricotta to make it spreadable. On top, chopped grape tomatoes, sweet and crunchy, with a drizzle of olive and fleur de sel.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup Garlic and Fine Herbs Boursin
6 3/4-inch slices baguette, cut on a steep bias

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, mash together the Boursin and ricotta. Set aside.
Toast the baguette slices in a toaster until just golden and slightly crisp. Set on a rack to keep crisp, and cool.
When the bread is cool, spread with the Boursin mixture. Toss the tomato, olive oil, and fleur de sel together, and spoon on the cheese-topped baguette slices. Serve immediately.
